Returns: The updated @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#turnbased#TurnBasedMatch_E@ object. Note that this may be null, depending on the status code returned.

ClassDesc: Result delivered when match has been updated. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully loaded and is up-to-date. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_OPERATION_DEFERRED_E@ if the attempt to leave the match resulted in a network error. The operation was stored locally, and will be retried the next time the device comes online. No further action is required. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MATCH_ERROR_LOCALLY_MODIFIED_E@ if the match has already been modified locally and has changes waiting to be synced to the server. The update operation was not executed. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MATCH_ERROR_INACTIVE_MATCH_E@ if the match has already transitioned into an inactive state on the server. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MATCH_ERROR_OUT_OF_DATE_VERSION_E@ if the local match state was out of date. In this case, the updated match will be returned. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MULTIPLAYER_ERROR_NOT_TRUSTED_TESTER_E@ if one of the users in the match is not a trusted tester of a game which is not yet published. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MULTIPLAYER_ERROR_INVALID_OPERATION_E@ if the server rejected the operation. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MULTIPLAYER_DISABLED_E@ if the game does not support multiplayer. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the client needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
